message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand where you're coming from, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $115?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to compromise a bit more. How about $122?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I still need to make some room for other expenses. Can you do $118?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $119. Can you go that low?
I'm really close to my budget, and I'd like to get as close to it as possible. Can you meet me at $117?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm at my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you at $118. This is my final offer.
I'm sorry, but I've already gone as low as I can. I'm going to have to pass on this deal. I think I'll go talk to John and see if he's still willing to sell the product for $150.
